issue.title: membersecure.anthem.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://membersecure.anthem.com/member/ssoLoader.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmembersecure.anthem.com%2Fmember%2FssoLoader.html) ### Comment > AdGuard has this annoying logo to the lower left of the the screen no matter what site I visit it is in my way. I may have to uninstall this extension due to this absurd and unnecessary distraction. Anyone know how to fix it? I'll wait a couple of days for a solution. If none is found I will delete extension. Username: `@donthaveone` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

issue.title: play-cloud.games.dmm.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play-cloud.games.dmm.com/cloudgame/gameplay/doaxvv](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay-cloud.games.dmm.com%2Fcloudgame%2Fgameplay%2Fdoaxvv) ### Comment > ゲームをプレイしているときに表示されるポップアップ画面が白く表示される > ・ゲーム開始時にホーム画面で強制的に表示されるポップアップ画面が白く表示される > ・ホーム画面→お知らせボタン→いずれかの項目をクリックするとポップアップ画面が白く表示される > ・ホーム画面→ガチャボタン→各ガチャのガチャ詳細ボタンをクリックするとポップアップ画面が白く表示される ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ouq5toop7qscgks8c8cg0gggksk8co0ibnqiv0dq3w.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/b9pk54hktxs80sogsswg0ww808s0coklaayy4o0cpw.png?nc=1)

pull_request.title: fix quotidiano.net group broken video, annoyances and social
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [x] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Your comment This pull request is to fix all quotidiano.net group, that is 1) `ilrestodelcarlino.it` (already fixed, issue #168507 ) 2) `quotidiano.net` (already fixed, issue #168542 ) 3) `lanazione.it` (screenshot 1) check -> https://www.lanazione.it/firenze/cronaca/allarme-bomba-casa-pound-94924538 4) `ilgiorno.it` (screenshot 2) check -> https://www.ilgiorno.it/pavia/cronaca/milano-belgioioso-pullman-incidente-48bc51e1 5) `iltelegrafolivorno.it` (screenshot 3) check -> https://www.iltelegrafolivorno.it/cronaca/inaugurato-a-livorno-il-nuovo-ponte-in-via-di-salviano-bd16c8f6 In addition, `lanazione.it` whatsapp subscription (let me know if it's the wrong section or you prefer don't hide it) (screenshot 4) 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot 2:
Screenshot 3: Screenshot 4: ### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met
